revised_title: Further Observations on Animalcula in Semine Masculino
tldr: The author, Anthony van Lewen-Hoek, provides further observations on the animalcula found in male semen using a microscope. He describes the movement and behavior of these living creatures, as well as their anatomy, and compares his findings to those of another researcher. Van Lewen-Hoek also discusses the limitations of microscopy and the importance of precise observations.
